Detailed Description

IpoptApplication defines an interface application class for IPOPT solvers.

Author
Ayonga Hereid
Date
2016-10-22

Member Function Documentation

◆ initialize()

function obj = IpoptApplication.initialize ( )

This function initialize the specific NLP application based on the nonlinear programming problem (specified by nlp).

The initialization including group different types of constraints, index objective functions and constraints arrays, etc.

See also
NonlinearProgram
Generated fields of obj:

◆ optimize()

function [ sol , info ] = IpoptApplication.optimize (   x0)
virtual

This function runs the solver's optimization routine for the NLP.

Be sure the run the initialization procedure before run this function.

Implements SolverApplication.
